amendment.description: To modify the period for exercise of authority for the sale by the Department of Defense of aircraft and parts for wildfire suppression purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2223 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2223 proposed by Senator Lummis for Senator Sheehy.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2223 proposed by Senator Lummis for Senator Sheehy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2223 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
